DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the safety and weight loss when sibutramine is used in overweight and obese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase IV, Multi-Center, Open-Label Trial of Sibutramine in Combination With a Hypocaloric Diet in Obese and Overweight Thai Subjects.
DOC.criteria: Subject has nutritional obesity and BMI >30 kg/m Type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus Inadequately controlled hypertension History of Gilles de la Tourette's Syndrome. Use of any MAOIs, SSRIs, amino acids, antimigraine drugs, opioids Hypothyroidism or hyperthyroidism. History of: benign prostatic hyperplasia neurological disorders psychiatric illness severe renal or hepatic impairments narrowangle glaucoma History of cardiovascular disease or cerebrovascular disease Persistent tachycardia at rest Pulmonary hypertension Phaeochromocytoma
